title: display font
content:
looking for a font close to "evil spirits"

Font: 

 Custom font 

Solved By:

author: pacedesign

comments.content:
This lettering is a pastiche of styles. Note for example the median spurs -- found in many wild west fonts --and the foxtail terminals There are some fonts that catch some of the flavor of the lettering.  
An interesting substitute is Jonathan Barnbrook's Mason [http://www.emigre.com/EF.php?fid=104](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317111840/http:/www.emigre.com/EF.php?fid=104 "http://www.emigre.com/EF.php?fid=104") and  
Others include Midnight-Show [https://creativemarket.com/Alterdecofont/15306-Midnight-Show-typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317111840/https:/creativemarket.com/Alterdecofont/15306-Midnight-Show-typeface "https://creativemarket.com/Alterdecofont/15306-Midnight-Show-typeface") Exocet by Jonathan Barnbrook [http://www.emigre.com/EF.php?fid=95](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317111840/http:/www.emigre.com/EF.php?fid=95 "http://www.emigre.com/EF.php?fid=95") and the Dogma movie font, a fan effort as Avqest [http://www.fontspace.com/gemfonts/avqest](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317111840/http:/www.fontspace.com/gemfonts/avqest "http://www.fontspace.com/gemfonts/avqest"). Jeremy Dooley's Newcomen  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/insigne/newcomen/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317111840/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/insigne/newcomen/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/insigne/newcomen/")  
Don

A few more. Stanley [https://creativemarket.com/twicolabs/21073-TM-Stanley](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317111840/https:/creativemarket.com/twicolabs/21073-TM-Stanley "https://creativemarket.com/twicolabs/21073-TM-Stanley") Xiybret Road [http://www.letterheadfonts.com/fonts/countryroad.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317111840/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/fonts/countryroad.php "http://www.letterheadfonts.com/fonts/countryroad.php") Sly [https://creativemarket.com/twicolabs/15341-Sly](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317111840/https:/creativemarket.com/twicolabs/15341-Sly "https://creativemarket.com/twicolabs/15341-Sly")  
Don
Nothing new so only pointing to the [previous discussion](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317111840/http:/typophile.com/node/114922) on this specific topic.

thanks very much. Very helpful.  
I had a feeling it was mostly hand lettered, given the design firm that created the label.
